WRITING.TITLE: Help me pl0x senpais
WRITING.TEXT: So, this might be stupid question but i'd really love to know. When i started playing ~2 years ago, my friend who was like rank 5,000 by the time played with my account just to show me what it's like (back then i had no idea about ranks so it wasn't to boost me, believe it or not). However, now that i actually would like to see my actual rank I'm not sure if i can delete the scores he got, since they're way above my current level (my top 2 ranks are from the songs he played). So yea, my question is that is there any way i could delete them and what do you guys think about this? Im sitting at ~930pp atm and ~140 came from the songs he played.

LunatiK have pretty decent match history so far, (im not going to count the vVv game, coz of.. reasons.) and MostlyH have not been playing that well, sure they won.. woosah? But that's not as impressive as winning clown9 (1-0) and mouseSpaz (3-1), atleast in my opinion.
